frameDefinitions: An Agent causes a Patient to be wet with a Liquid.

Commerce is a situation in which a Buyer and a Seller have agreed upon an exchange of Money and Goods (possibly after a negotiation), and then perform the exchange, optionally carrying it out with various kinds of direct payment or financing or the giving of change.
This frame concerns internally undifferentiated Substances.

The answer to one open question, the Outcome, is dictated (partially or completely) by the answer to another open question, the Determinant, i.e. if the answer to the Determinant is known, the answer to the Outcome can be predicted.
A Dependent state-of-affairs has a Requirement as a prerequisite for obtaining or occurring.
The obtaining of a Requirement state of affairs or the presence of a Required_entity is profiled as a prerequisite for the obtaining or occurring of a Dependent state-of-affairs.
frameExamples: As their gut bacteria ferment cellulose , they generate methane <t>gas</t> , which escapes from the rear ends of the insects.
Economic policy is partially a <t>function</t> of cultural values.
The atomic bombings were probably not <t>necessary</t> to win WWII without a mainland invasion of Japan.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Agent</fen> is a volitional animate being who causes the <fen>Patient</fen> to become wet.
The <fen>Liquid</fen> is a fluid or gas that permeates or covers the <fen>Patient</fen>.  It most frequently occurs in a PP Complement headed by with.
The <fen>Patient</fen> takes up the <fen>Liquid</fen> through its pores or has the <fen>Liquid</fen> covering its surface.
An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that produces the state of wetness.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> wets the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> wets the <fen>Patient</fen>.
The <fen>Buyer</fen> has the <fen>Money</fen> and wants the <fen>Goods</fen>.
The <fen>Seller</fen> has the <fen>Goods</fen> and wants the <fen>Money</fen>.
<fen>Money</fen> is given in exchange for <fen>Goods</fen> in a transaction.
<fen>Goods</fen> is anything including labor or time, for example, which is exchanged for <fen>Money</fen> in a transaction.
The undifferentiated entity which is presented as having a permanent existence.
An open question that is (to some degree) predictable from the Determinant.
An open question that determines the <fen>Outcome</fen>.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The entity or state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the state of affairs of the <fen>Requirement</fen> or the presence of the <fen>Required_entity</fen>.
The state-of-affairs that must obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Hannah</fex> drenched the cat with anti-flea ointment.
She was considered a <fex>purchaser</fex> of the finest things
<fex>My local grocery store</fex> raised prices on meat
The price of the sweater was <fex> $50</fex>.
She was considered a purchaser <fex>of the finest things</fex>
<fex><t>Liquid</t></fex> flowed over the rocks but it was not water.
Price, in such a case, depends <fex>only on the whim of the supplier</fex>.
<fex>In the US</fex>, the political clout of big city mayors is necessary to put this on the national agenda.
Believe it or not, but this cake requires <fex>a pound of mild sausage</fex>.
<fex>In the US</fex>, putting this on the agenda requires the political weight and leadership of big city mayors.
